Class BlockProtAPI

java.lang.Object
de.dei0.blockprot.bukkit.BlockProtAPI
public final class BlockProtAPI extends Object
BlockProt's class for external API methods.
Since:
0.4.7
Author:
spnda

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      @Nullable public static @Nullable BlockProtAPI getInstance()
      Get the current instance of this API. Remember to softdepend this plugin, otherwise this API will not be initialized and this will return null.
      Returns:
      The instance or null if not initialized
      Since:
      0.4.7

    • registerIntegration

      public void registerIntegration(@NotNull @NotNull PluginIntegration integration)
      Registers a integration. This automatically calls PluginIntegration.enable() to load the plugin and also adds them to a internal list (accessible through getIntegrations()) which is used for friend handling. This does not ensure that there are no duplicates of a integration, so please beware to only register your integration once.
      Parameters:
      integration - The integration to register.
      Since:
      0.4.7

    • getIntegrations

      @NotNull public @NotNull List<PluginIntegration> getIntegrations()
      Get a list of all integrations that have been registered using registerIntegration(PluginIntegration). There might possibly be duplicates of some integrations, if the author of those registered them more than once.
      Returns:
      A unmodifiable list of all registered integrations.
      Since:
      0.4.7

    • getBlockHandler

      @NotNull public @NotNull BlockNBTHandler getBlockHandler(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.block.Block block)
      Get the handler for given blocks. This is used to get information about the owner, the friends and the redstone protection.
      Parameters:
      block - The block to get the handler for.
      Returns:
      The BlockNBTHandler for the given block.
      Since:
      0.4.7

    • getPlayerSettings

      @NotNull public @NotNull PlayerSettingsHandler getPlayerSettings(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Get the player settings handler for given player. This is used to retrieve default friends or other globally applicable settings for the player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player.
      Returns:
      The PlayerSettingsHandler for the given player.
      Since:
      0.4.7

    • getLockInventoryForBlock

      @Nullable public @Nullable org.bukkit.inventory.Inventory getLockInventoryForBlock(@NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.block.Block block, @NotNull @NotNull org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Get the lock inventory for given block and player. This call triggers the BlockAccessMenuEvent event and checks if it succeeded and what permissions the player has and bases the inventory on that information.
      Parameters:
      block - The block the player is trying to access.
      player - The player.
      Returns:
      The inventory or null, if the request was denied, possibly due to permissions.
      Since:
      0.4.7
